SEARCH
Package com.nnk.springboot.controllers

Class RatingController

java.lang.Object
com.nnk.springboot.controllers.RatingController
@Controller public class RatingController extends Object
Controller class for the Rating folder. Page to see the list of all Rating. Page to update Ratings. Page to delete Ratings.

  • Method Details

    • ratingDto

      @ModelAttribute("ratingDto") public RatingDto ratingDto()

    • ratingList

      @RequestMapping("/rating/list") public String ratingList(Principal principal, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      To get and display the Rating list.
      Parameters:
      principal - the user authenticated.
      model - to parse data to the view.
      Returns:
      the list.html of the rating template folder.

    • addRatingForm

      @GetMapping("/rating/add") public String addRatingForm()
      To display the add page.
      Returns:
      the add.html of the rating template folder.

    • validate

      @PostMapping("/rating/validate") public String validate(@Valid @Valid RatingDto ratingDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      To get data from the validate form into the add page.
      Parameters:
      ratingDto - the model to get data form the form inputs.
      result - the validation of the form.
      model - to get data from the view.
      Returns:
      redirect on the rating/list page or stay on the add page if result has an error.

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/rating/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      To display the update page.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Rating to update parsed.
      model - the Rating's attributes to parse for the view.
      Returns:
      the update.html of the rating template folder.

    • updateRating

      @PostMapping("/rating/update/{id}") public String updateRating(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @Valid @Valid RatingDto ratingDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      To perform the update form of the page.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Rating parsed into the url of the page with showUpdateForm method.
      ratingDto - the Dto create after submit of the form to update the Rating.
      result - to catch any errors and return the related error message.
      model - to get data from the form.
      Returns:
      the list.html of the Rating template folder or stay on the update page if result has an error.

    • deleteRating

      @GetMapping("/rating/delete/{id}") public String deleteRating(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Manage the delete button. To delete the Rating. Call the deleteById of the RatingService to delete the Rating linked.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Rating linked.
      Returns:
      the list.html of the rating template folder.
